name: Furious Overlord
entries: At 20th level, your hatred can bolster your body turning you into an unstoppable juggernaut. As an action, you can become enraged for 1 minute. While enraged, you gain the following effects:

items: The effects of Unstoppable Force and Unyielding Body are always active during that minute.
Any damage you take is reduced by your Proficiency Bonus.
You gain an additional 15 feet of movement speed.
You are immune to the charmed and frightened conditions.

entries: These effects last for 1 minute or until you fall unconscious. After this ability ends, you gain two levels of exhaustion and cannot use it again until you finish a long rest.
